properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first manned hydrogen balloon on December 1, 1783, in Paris, France, by Professor Charles and Nicolas Robert with hydrogen balloon; commemorative cancellation stamp dated December 1, 1985 in Paris; includes information on reverse.
